TopicTitle: What mods contain hinges or folding wings?

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I use ksp 1.2 and I want to make a small plane with folding wings to deploy from a bomb bay, I think I need something that allows me to fold the wings to place the small plane inside. I'm looking for any mod that has this, do you know if it exists?

Thanks to all!

The only ones I know are Infernal Robotics for the hinges, and RetractableLiftingSurface for the wings.  This thread names a few others that I chose not to link because it also says that those mods don't often work very well.

I cannot speak to their compatibility with KSP 1.2; you'll have to find that out for yourself.

Edited November 20, 2017 by Zhetaan

Stock folding wings are entirely possible if you enjoy a challenge.

Plenty of good info around here on building stock hinges.

Mods are of course another way, but I think IR still needs updating last I checked.
Reusability Expansion has a foldable wing in 2 different sizes. I haven't tried them yet however.

There are folding wings in the SXT mod. Just the one, and meant for a small and slow aircraft, but it is a great part. 

With tweakscale you can make it as big as you need it to be.
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
